verses.verse: אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei These [are] the sons יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel רְאוּבֵ֤ן <WH7205> re-'u-Ven Reuben שִׁמְעוֹן֙ <WH8095> shim-'On Simeon לֵוִ֣י <WH3878> le-Vi Levi וִיהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> vi-hu-Dah, and Judah יִשָׂשכָ֖ר <WH3485> yi-so-sh-Char Issachar וּזְבֻלֽוּן׃ <WH2074> u-ze-vu-Lun. and Zebulun

דָּ֚ן <WH1835> dan Dan יוֹסֵ֣ף <WH3130> yo-Sef Joseph וּבִנְיָמִ֔ן <WH1144> u-vin-ya-Min, and Benjamin נַפְתָּלִ֖י <WH5321> naf-ta-Li Naphtali גָּ֥ד <WH1410> gad Gad וְאָשֵֽׁר׃ <WH836> ve-'a-Sher. and Asher ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The sons יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah עֵ֤ר <WH6147> 'er Er וְאוֹנָן֙ <WH209> ve-'o-Nan and Onan וְשֵׁלָ֔ה <WH7956> ve-she-Lah, and Shelah שְׁלוֹשָׁה֙ <WH7969> she-lo-Shah [which] three נ֣וֹלַד <WH3205> No-lad were born ל֔וֹ lo, מִבַּת־ <WH1323> mib-bat- unto him of the daughter שׁ֖וּעַ <WH7774> Shu-a' Shua הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֑ית <WH3669> hak-ke-na-'a-Nit; the Canaanitess וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> vay-Hi become עֵ֣ר׀ <WH6147> 'er And Er בְּכ֣וֹר <WH1060> be-Chor the firstborn יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah רַ֛ע <WH7451> ra' was evil בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God וַיְמִיתֵֽהוּ׃ <WH4191> vay-mi-Te-hu. and he slew ס sa-Mek

וְתָמָר֙ <WH8559> ve-ta-Mar And Tamar כַּלָּת֔וֹ <WH3618> kal-la-To, his daughter in law יָ֥לְדָה <WH3205> Yal-dah bare לּ֖וֹ lo אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- פֶּ֣רֶץ <WH6557> Pe-retz him Pharez וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et זָ֑רַח <WH2226> Za-rach; and Zerah כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei All the sons יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah חֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH2568> cha-mish-Shah. [were] five ס sa-Mek
בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> be-nei- The sons פֶ֖רֶץ <WH6557> Fe-retz of Pharez חֶצְר֥וֹן <WH2696> chetz-Ron Hezron וְחָמֽוּל׃ <WH2538> ve-cha-Mul. and Hamul ס sa-Mek

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons זֶ֗רַח <WH2226> Ze-rach, of Zerah זִ֠מְרִי <WH2174> Zim-ri Zimri וְאֵיתָ֧ן <WH387> ve-'ei-Tan and Ethan וְהֵימָ֛ן <WH1968> ve-hei-Man and Heman וְכַלְכֹּ֥ל <WH3633> ve-chal-Kol and Calcol וָדָ֖רַע <WH1873> va-Da-ra' and Dara כֻּלָּ֥ם <WH3605> kul-Lam all חֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH2568> cha-mish-Shah. five ס sa-Mek

וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons כַּרְמִ֑י <WH3756> kar-Mi; of Carmi עָכָר֙ <WH5917> 'a-Char Achar עוֹכֵ֣ר <WH5916> o-Cher the troubler יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who מָעַ֖ל <WH4603> ma-'Al who transgressed בַּחֵֽרֶם׃ <WH2764> ba-Che-rem. in the thing accursed ס sa-Mek
וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons אֵיתָ֖ן <WH387> 'ei-Tan of Ethan עֲזַרְיָֽה׃ <WH5838> 'a-zar-Yah. Azariah

וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei The sons חֶצְר֖וֹן <WH2696> chetz-Ron also of Hezron אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who נוֹלַד־ <WH3205> no-lad- that were born ל֑וֹ lo; אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְרַחְמְאֵ֥ל <WH3396> ye-rach-me-'El unto him Jerahmeel וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et רָ֖ם <WH7410> ram and Ram וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et כְּלוּבָֽי׃ <WH3621> ke-lu-Vai. and Chelubai

וְרָ֖ם <WH7410> ve-Ram And Ram הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עַמִּינָדָ֑ב <WH5992> 'am-mi-na-Dav; Amminadab וְעַמִּינָדָב֙ <WH5992> ve-'am-mi-na-Dav and Amminadab הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- נַחְשׁ֔וֹן <WH5177> nach-Shon, Nahshon נְשִׂ֖יא <WH5387> ne-Si prince בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah. of Judah

וְנַחְשׁוֹן֙ <WH5177> ve-nach-shOn And Nahshon הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שַׂלְמָ֔א <WH8007> sal-Ma, Salma וְשַׂלְמָ֖א <WH8007> ve-sal-Ma and Salma הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בֹּֽעַז׃ <WH1162> Bo-'az. Boaz

וּבֹ֙עַז֙ <WH1162> u-Vo-'az And Boaz הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עוֹבֵ֔ד <WH5744> o-Ved, Obed וְעוֹבֵ֖ד <WH5744> ve-'o-Ved and Obed הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יִשָֽׁי׃ <WH3448> yi-Shai. Jesse

וְאִישַׁ֛י <WH3448> ve-'i-Shai And Jesse הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּכֹר֖וֹ <WH1060> be-cho-Ro his firstborn אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֱלִיאָ֑ב <WH446> 'e-li-'Av; Eliab וַאֲבִינָדָב֙ <WH41> va-'a-vi-na-Dav and Abinadab הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <WH8145> hash-she-Ni, the second וְשִׁמְעָ֖א <WH8092> ve-shim-'A and Shimma הַשְּׁלִישִֽׁי׃ <WH7992> hash-she-li-Shi. the third
נְתַנְאֵל֙ <WH5417> ne-tan-'El Nethaneel הָֽרְבִיעִ֔י <WH7243> ha-re-vi-'I, the fourth רַדַּ֖י <WH7288> rad-Dai Raddai הַחֲמִישִֽׁי׃ <WH2549> ha-cha-mi-Shi. the fifth
אֹ֚צֶם <WH684> 'O-tzem Ozem הַשִּׁשִּׁ֔י <WH8345> hash-shish-Shi, the sixth דָּוִ֖יד <WH1732> da-Vid David הַשְּׁבִעִֽי׃ <WH7637> hash-she-vi-'I. the seventh

וְאַחְיֹתֵיהֶם ve-'ach-yo-tei-hem כוְאַחְיֹותֵיהֶ֖ם <WH269> ve-'ach-yo-tei-Hem other קצְרוּיָ֣ה <WH6870> tze-ru-Yah [were] Zeruiah וַאֲבִיגָ֑יִל <WH26> va-'a-vi-Ga-yil; and Abigail וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons צְרוּיָ֗ה <WH6870> tze-ru-Yah, of Zeruiah אַבְשַׁ֛י <WH52> 'av-Shai Abishai וְיוֹאָ֥ב <WH3097> ve-yo-'Av and Joab וַעֲשָׂה־ va-'a-sah- אֵ֖ל <WH6214> 'el and Asahel שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> she-lo-Shah. three

וַאֲבִיגַ֕יִל <WH26> va-'a-vi-Ga-yil And Abigail יָלְדָ֖ה <WH3205> Yal-dah bare אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֲמָשָׂ֑א <WH6021> 'a-ma-Sa; Amasa וַאֲבִ֣י <WH1> va-'a-Vi and the father עֲמָשָׂ֔א <WH6021> 'a-ma-Sa, of Amasa יֶ֖תֶר <WH3500> Ye-ter [was] Jether הַיִּשְׁמְעֵאלִֽי׃ <WH3459> hai-yish-me-'e-Li. the Ishmeelite

וְכָלֵ֣ב <WH3612> ve-cha-Lev And Caleb בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son חֶצְר֗וֹן <WH2696> chetz-Ron, of Hezron הוֹלִ֛יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֲזוּבָ֥ה <WH5806> 'a-zu-Vah Azubah אִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> 'ish-Shah [his] wife וְאֶת־ <WH854> ve-'Et [children] of יְרִיע֑וֹת <WH3408> ye-ri-'ot; and of Jerioth וְאֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> ve-'El-leh and these בָנֶ֔יהָ <WH1121> va-Nei-ha, her sons יֵ֥שֶׁר <WH3475> Ye-sher [are] these Jesher וְשׁוֹבָ֖ב <WH7727> ve-sho-Vav and Shobab וְאַרְדּֽוֹן׃ <WH715> ve-'ar-Don. and Ardon

וַתָּ֖מָת <WH4191> vat-Ta-mot was dead עֲזוּבָ֑ה <WH5806> 'a-zu-Vah; And when Azubah וַיִּֽקַּֽח־ <WH3947> vai-yik-kach- took ל֤וֹ lo כָלֵב֙ <WH3612> cha-Lev Caleb אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֶפְרָ֔ת <WH672> 'ef-Rat, unto him Ephrath וַתֵּ֥לֶד <WH3205> vat-Te-led which bare ל֖וֹ lo אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- חֽוּר׃ <WH2354> Chur. him Hur

וְחוּר֙ <WH2354> ve-Chur And Hur הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אוּרִ֔י <WH221> 'u-Ri, Uri וְאוּרִ֖י <WH221> ve-'u-Ri and Uri הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּצַלְאֵֽל׃ <WH1212> be-tzal-'El. Bezaleel ס sa-Mek

וְאַחַ֗ר <WH310> ve-'a-Char, And afterward בָּ֤א <WH935> ba went in חֶצְרוֹן֙ <WH2696> chetz-rOn Hezron אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to בַּת־ <WH1323> bat- to the daughter מָכִיר֙ <WH4353> ma-Chir of Machir אֲבִ֣י <WH1> 'a-Vi the father גִלְעָ֔ד <WH1568> gil-'Ad, of Gilead וְה֣וּא <WH1931> ve-Hu he לְקָחָ֔הּ <WH3947> le-ka-Chah, whom he married וְה֖וּא <WH1931> ve-Hu he בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- old שִׁשִּׁ֣ים <WH8346> shish-Shim when he [was] threescore שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> sha-Nah; years וַתֵּ֥לֶד <WH3205> vat-Te-led and she bare ל֖וֹ lo אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׂגֽוּב׃ <WH7687> se-Guv. him Segub

וּשְׂג֖וּב <WH7687> u-se-Guv And Segub הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יָאִ֑יר <WH2971> ya-'Ir; Jair וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> vay-hi- had ל֗וֹ lo, עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim and twenty וְשָׁלוֹשׁ֙ <WH7969> ve-sha-lo-Vosh who had three עָרִ֔ים <WH5892> 'a-Rim, cities בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land הַגִּלְעָֽד׃ <WH1568> hag-gil-'Ad. of Gilead

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> vai-yik-Kach And he took גְּשֽׁוּר־ <WH1650> ge-shur- Geshur וַ֠אֲרָם <WH758> Va-'a-rom and Aram אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- for חַוֹּ֨ת <WH2333> chav-Vot with the towns יָאִ֧יר <WH2971> ya-'Ir of Jair מֵאִתָּ֛ם <WH853> me-'it-Tam אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- with קְנָ֥ת <WH7079> ke-Nat from them with Kenath וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בְּנֹתֶ֖יהָ <WH1323> be-no-Tei-ha and the towns שִׁשִּׁ֣ים <WH8346> shish-Shim thereof [even] threescore עִ֑יר <WH5892> 'Ir; cities כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All אֵ֕לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh these בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> be-Nei All these [belonged to] the sons מָכִ֥יר <WH4353> ma-Chir of Machir אֲבִי־ <WH1> 'a-vi- the father גִלְעָֽד׃ <WH1568> gil-'Ad. of Gilead

וְאַחַ֥ר <WH310> ve-'a-Char And after מוֹת־ <WH4194> mot- was dead חֶצְר֖וֹן <WH2696> chetz-Ron that Hezron בְּכָלֵ֣ב be-cha-Lev אֶפְרָ֑תָה <WH3613> 'ef-Ra-tah; in Calebephratah וְאֵ֤שֶׁת <WH802> ve-'E-shet wife חֶצְרוֹן֙ <WH2696> chetz-rOn Hezron's אֲבִיָּ֔ה <WH29> 'a-vi-Yah, then Abiah וַתֵּ֣לֶד <WH3205> vat-Te-led bare ל֔וֹ lo, אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אַשְׁח֖וּר <WH806> 'ash-Chur him Ashur אֲבִ֥י <WH1> 'a-Vi the father תְקֽוֹעַ׃ <WH8620> te-Ko-a'. of Tekoa

וַיִּהְי֧וּ <WH1961> vai-yih-Yu become בְנֵי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- And the sons יְרַחְמְאֵ֛ל <WH3396> ye-rach-me-'El of Jerahmeel בְּכ֥וֹר <WH1060> be-Chor the firstborn חֶצְר֖וֹן <WH2696> chetz-Ron of Hezron הַבְּכ֣וֹר׀ <WH1060> hab-be-Chor the firstborn רָ֑ם <WH7410> Ram; were Ram וּבוּנָ֥ה <WH946> u-vu-Nah and Bunah וָאֹ֛רֶן <WH767> va-'O-ren and Oren וָאֹ֖צֶם <WH684> va-'O-tzem and Ozem אֲחִיָּֽה׃ <WH281> 'a-chi-Yah. [and] Ahijah

וַתְּהִ֨י <WH1961> vat-te-Hi had אִשָּׁ֥ה <WH802> 'ish-Shah wife אַחֶ֛רֶת <WH312> 'a-Che-ret had also another לִֽירַחְמְאֵ֖ל <WH3396> li-rach-me-'El Jerahmeel וּשְׁמָ֣הּ <WH8034> u-she-Mah whose name עֲטָרָ֑ה <WH5851> 'a-ta-Rah; [was] Atarah הִ֖יא <WH1931> hi she אֵ֥ם <WH517> 'em she [was] the mother אוֹנָֽם׃ <WH208> o-Nam. of Onam ס sa-Mek

וַיִּהְי֥וּ <WH1961> vai-yih-Yu become בְנֵי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- And the sons רָ֖ם <WH7410> ram of Ram בְּכ֣וֹר <WH1060> be-Chor the firstborn יְרַחְמְאֵ֑ל <WH3396> ye-rach-me-'El; of Jerahmeel מַ֥עַץ <WH4619> Ma-'atz were Maaz וְיָמִ֖ין <WH3226> ve-ya-Min and Jamin וָעֵֽקֶר׃ <WH6134> va-'E-ker. and Eker

וַיִּהְי֥וּ <WH1961> vai-yih-Yu become בְנֵי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- And the sons אוֹנָ֖ם <WH208> o-Nam of Onam שַׁמַּ֣י <WH8060> sham-Mai were Shammai וְיָדָ֑ע <WH3047> ve-ya-Da'; and Jada וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons שַׁמַּ֔י <WH8060> sham-Mai, of Shammai נָדָ֖ב <WH5070> na-Dav Nadab וַאֲבִישֽׁוּר׃ <WH51> va-'a-vi-Shur. and Abishur

וְשֵׁ֛ם <WH8034> ve-Shem And the name אֵ֥שֶׁת <WH802> 'E-shet of the wife אֲבִישׁ֖וּר <WH51> 'a-vi-Shur of Abishur אֲבִיהָ֑יִל <WH32> 'a-vi-Ha-yil; [was] Abihail וַתֵּ֣לֶד <WH3205> vat-Te-led and she bare ל֔וֹ lo, אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אַחְבָּ֖ן <WH257> 'ach-Ban him Ahban וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מוֹלִֽיד׃ <WH4140> mo-Lid. and Molid

וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons נָדָ֖ב <WH5070> na-Dav of Nadab סֶ֣לֶד <WH5540> Se-led Seled וְאַפָּ֑יִם <WH649> ve-'ap-Pa-yim; and Appaim וַיָּ֥מָת <WH4191> vai-Ya-mot died סֶ֖לֶד <WH5540> Se-led but Seled לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo without בָנִֽים׃ <WH1121> va-Nim. without children ס sa-Mek

וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons אַפַּ֖יִם <WH649> 'ap-Pa-yim of Appaim יִשְׁעִ֑י <WH3469> yish-'I; Ishi וּבְנֵ֤י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons יִשְׁעִי֙ <WH3469> yish-'I of Ishi שֵׁשָׁ֔ן <WH8348> she-Shan, Sheshan וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the children שֵׁשָׁ֖ן <WH8348> she-Shan of Sheshan אַחְלָֽי׃ <WH304> 'ach-Lai. Ahlai
